name: 2024 the 13th International Conference on Educational and Information Technology
content: Publication: Accepted papers will be published into conference proceedings by IEEE, which is the same with the last years. The proceedings will be submitted and reviewed by the IEEE Xplore and Ei Compendex and Scopus after the conference. ICEIT 2024 is listed in IEEE conference calendarï¼šhttps://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/61397
